title: Solve the System
text:
Using substitution we can substitute $$h=2w-18000$$ into $$h+w=84000$$ to solve for w, the wife's earnings.
$$h+w=84000$$
$$2w-18000+w=84000$$
$$3w-18000=84000$$
$$3w=102000$$
